```{R}
require(ggplot2)
```

```{R}
main <- read.csv('main.csv')
combined <- read.csv('Combined.csv')
```


Population---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

```{R}
ggplot(data=main, aes(x=main$population,y=main$suicides_no,color = main$sex )) +  
    geom_point(alpha=0.1) +
  ggtitle("Main Plot -- Population Vs Suicide No")+
scale_x_continuous(name = "Population")+
      scale_y_continuous(name = "Suicide No") + 
      labs(color="Sex")
```

```{R, fig.width=20, fig.height=11}
tes <-aggregate(main$suicides_no, by=list(main$Country), FUN=mean)
ggplot(data=tes, aes(x=reorder(tes$Group.1,tes$x),fill =Group.1 )) +  
  geom_col(data=tes, aes(x=reorder(tes$Group.1,tes$x), y=tes$x,fill =Group.1 )) +
theme(legend.position="top",
      axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45))+
  guides(fill = guide_legend(nrow = 8))+
      labs(fill="Country")+
        scale_y_continuous(name = "Suicide No") + 
        scale_x_discrete(name = "Country") + 
  ggtitle("Main Plot -- Country Vs Mean Suicide No")
```

```{R, fig.width=20, fig.height=11}
tes <-aggregate(main$suicides.100k.pop, by=list(main$Country), FUN=mean)
tes = tes[order(-tes$x),]
tes = tes[1:10,]
ggplot(data=tes, aes(x=reorder(tes$Group.1,tes$x),fill =Group.1 )) +  
  geom_col(data=tes, aes(x=reorder(tes$Group.1,tes$x), y=tes$x,fill =Group.1 )) +
theme(legend.position="top",
      axis.text = element_text(face="bold", color="Black",size=12, angle=45),
      axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45),
      axis.title = element_text(face="bold", color="firebrick",size=20),
              plot.title =  element_text(size=25, color = "firebrick",face = "bold",hjust = .5))+
  guides(fill = guide_legend(nrow = 1))+
      labs(fill="Country")+
        scale_y_continuous(name = "Suicide No Per 100K Population") + 
        scale_x_discrete(name = "Country") + 
  ggtitle("Main Plot -- Top 10 Country With Max Mean Suicide No Per 100K population")
```

```{R}
tes <-aggregate(main$suicides_no, by=list(main$age), FUN=mean)
pop <-aggregate(main$population, by=list(main$age), FUN=mean)
ggplot(data=tes, aes(x=reorder(tes$Group.1,tes$x) )) +  
    geom_col(data=pop, aes(y=(pop$x/10000 * -1),color ="Overall Population in 1e4"),fill="black") +
  geom_col(data=tes, aes(x=reorder(tes$Group.1,tes$x), y=tes$x,fill =Group.1 )) +
  theme(
      axis.text = element_text(face="bold", color="Black",size=10, angle=45),
      axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45),
      axis.title = element_text(face="bold", color="firebrick",size=15),
              plot.title =  element_text(size=20, color = "firebrick",face = "bold",hjust = .5))+
      labs(fill="Age Group",color = "")+
        scale_y_continuous(name = "Suicide No") + 
        scale_x_discrete(name = "Age Group") + 
  ggtitle("Main Plot -- Age Groups Vs Suicide No")
```

combinedMale = combined[combined$sex == 'male',]

tesFemale <-aggregate(combinedFemale$suicides_no, by=list(combinedFemale$age), FUN=mean)

  geom_col(data=tesMale, aes(y=tesMale$x,x=reorder(tesMale$Group.1,tesMale$x),fill = tesMale$Group.1)) +
    geom_col(data=tesFemale, aes(y=tesFemale$x*-1,x=tesFemale$Group.1)) +
  ggtitle("Combined Plot -- Male(Color) Female(Black) -- Suicide No Vs Age Group")

```{R}
combinedMale = main[main$sex == 'male',]
combinedFemale = main[main$sex == 'female',]
tesMale <-aggregate(combinedMale$suicides.100k.pop, by=list(combinedMale$Year), FUN=mean)
tesFemale <-aggregate(combinedFemale$suicides.100k.pop, by=list(combinedFemale$Year), FUN=mean)
ggplot() +  
  geom_col(data=tesMale, aes(y=tesMale$x,x=tesMale$Group.1,fill = "Male")) +
    geom_col(data=tesFemale, aes(y=tesFemale$x*-1,x=tesFemale$Group.1,color = "Female")) +
  theme(axis.text = element_text(face="bold", color="Black",size=12, angle=45),
            axis.text.y = element_text(angle = 0), 
            axis.title = element_text(face="bold", color="firebrick",size=15),
            legend.text = element_text(size=15,colour = "DarkGreen"),
            plot.title =  element_text(size=18, color = "firebrick",face = "bold",hjust = .5)) + 
      scale_x_continuous(name = "Years",breaks=seq(1985,2016,5),labels = seq(1985,2016,5))+
      scale_y_continuous(name = "Suicides per 100K population") + 
      labs(color="",fill ="" )+
  ggtitle("Main Plot --Suicides per 100K population Vs Year For respective Sex")
```
